required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-Drug Interaction Study Between AZD1981 and Pravastatin to Study the Effect of AZD1981 on the Kinetics of Pravastatin
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open Label, Randomised, Parallel Group Study of Repeated Oral Doses of AZD1981 (100 mg Twice Daily and 400 mg Twice Daily Via Tablet) for Eight Days and Single Doses of Pravastatin (Pravachol® Tablet 40 mg) to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetic Interaction of AZD1981 and Pravastatin in Healthy Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to determine whether the treatment with AZD1981 will affect the pharmacokinetics of pravastatin.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics for pravastatin measured by Cmax and AUC
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed on Day 1, period A and on Day 7-8, period B
primary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics for pravastatin measured by Cmax and AUC

secondary_outcome.time_frame: PK sampling will be performed on Day 1, period A and on Day 7-8, period B
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics for pravastatin measured by AUC[0-t],Cmax (tmax), CL/F, t1/2λz, Vz/F, MRT

secondary_outcome.time_frame: PK sampling will be performed on Day 7 and Day 8, period B
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics for AZD1981 measured by AUCτ,Css,max, Css, max (tmax ss), CLss/F, t1/2λz, Vz/F, MRT

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Safety will be monitored continously and safety assessments will be made on several occasions throughout the whole study

intervention.description: 100 mg per oral, twice daily for 8 days
4x100 mg per oral, twice daily for 8 days
40 mg, once daily at Day 1, period A and Day 8, period B

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male volunteers aged 18 to 55, inclusive
- Have a body mass index between 19 and 30 kg/m2 and weight at least 50 kg and no more than 100 kg, inclusive
- Be a non-smoker or ex-smoker who has stopped smoking for >6 months prior to screening
- Volunteers must be willing to use barrier methods of contraception during study and 3 months after the end of their participation in the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any clinically significant disease or disorder
- Any clinically relevant abnormal findings in physical examination

clinical_study.keyword: The pharmacokinetics resulting from AZD1981 and pravastatin interaction
The effects of taking a combination of AZD1981 and pravastatin
